Reviews.Content: husband avid travellers stayed 1 star establishments backpackers 5 star resorts boutique hotels impromptu trip nyc nights difficulty finding hotel price middle season apple scouring deal discount websites past form getting deal travelocitys blind bidding service getting jolly hotel reviews read prior fair heres add 1 location amazing five minute walk grand central fifteen minute walk times square bryant park herald square midtown attractions close 2 clean linens fresh service spot 3 air conditioning little noisy becoming white noise husband noise nyc regular noise staying properties ac noise chalked 4 staff courteous helpful directions late limo airport 5 bathroom nice bathroom similar properties shower pressure floor tiling clean trendy 6 cramped plenty space luggage walking relaxing 7 paid looking 35 star hotel manhattan property 3 star worth price paid day husband nyc city explored unless business probably spending time 1 hallway dated green turf carpeting bug concern 2 tvs box office service nevertheless house staff offered fix 3 bed little soft caved advised front desk complaint 4 free wifi mcdonalds pret manger starbucks minute walk property free wifi definitely recommend hotel upgrade reading reviews walked pleasantly surprised scared ourselves bad reviews bottomline enjoyed stay picky

Reviews.Title: “Far from "boutique" - decent room - shame about the wifi”

Reviews.Content: hotels facebook page calls boutique hotel false advertising theres boutique standard hotel slight italian touch top im paying us250 night pay extra wifi wifi phone laptop pay twice guys 10 21st century breakfast 19 crossed road excellent breakfasts moonstruck cafã© half price booked hotel try bit bad idea generic hotel doubt ill coming unless cant else

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away!”
Reviews.Author: HonestJane_10
Reviews.Content: terrible poky dank hallways free internet todays world burger king free wifi stinky little fridge cooling accumulated dirty water changed fridge fixed neither strange reason charged card extra 25 signed receipt recommend maybe 50 night definitely worth 230 night

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights celebrate daughters 18th birthday pleasantly surprised bit research hotels chose hotel honest brain dead hotel tends blend chose price standard location clean adequate party double twin nights sleep spoiled arriving 0300 hrs 2 consecutive nights werent particularly noisey walls thin guess didnt eat hotel tended walk accross street moonstruck cafe breakfasts altho staff smiled hotel 20 mins walk times square bit dissapointing evry street film set otherwise 700 ride tofrom occassionally weather poor 510 mins walk empire terms taxi jfk service offered hotel cost 70 inc tip 20 goes straight concierges pocket mate comes taxi wasnt metered slow jouney yellow cab equated enjoyable stay

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, great location. Pity about the night time roadworks.”

Reviews.Content: hotel recommended friends arrived werent dissappointed exactly fantastic location empire building interiour paid nice fancy 2 nights roadworks road outside 8pm 430am 6 months july happen mondayfriday friday night included complained told memo front desk website hotel booked offer discount roadworks affect cheaper expensive block advice book cheaper 4 months week otherwise lovely hotel value money location probably check advance roadworks
